author: Buying Business Travel
title: Altour joins Radius Travel
text:
Follow @thomasnewcombe 
Global travel management company Radius Travel has announced that Altour has joined its network. 
Altour is an independent travel agency which has sales in excess of $2 billion. It has headquarters in New York and Los Angeles and services both the corporate and entertainment sector. 
The deal brings Radius to 80 member agencies that service 85 countries worldwide. 
Altour said Radius membership will “significantly expand its global footprint and ability to serve its clients’ needs”. 
“Radius offers Altour access to the world’s leading travel management network and to our strong suite of global services and products to serve multinational customers,” said Shannon Hyland, Radius Travel President and CEO.”
